cleaned_text: Flowers, Crystal-Infused Botanical Aromatherapy Body Oil Flowers, is a garden-inspired floral, blooming with Neroli, Ylang Ylang, and Bulgarian Lavender essential oils, among others, in our proprietary blend. Only aromatherapy-quality essential oils are used for their energetic and therapeutic benefits. This luxurious, hydrating oil is lovely as a daily body oil, massage, or bath ~ a carefully selected blend of superior quality, organic, skin-nourishing oils, and essential oils, along with beautiful organic botanicals. Crystal-infused with Rose Quartz, Moss Agate, and Clear Quartz for the vibration of renewal, and heart-soothing unconditional love. Tiny crystals dance among the flowers in each bottle! Organic oils of Sunflower, Grape Seed, Sesame, Jojoba, Coconut, and Vitamin E for true skin nurturing.
